body.p:
Finkis Burg Elms: Potapeseco Copper Mines
Carrol Co MD.
November 22the 1860
Dr Sir

I rote to you some time in September -- I Sea the Legeslator of 6. Ky, I anssered a rewar of one $1000 to Cure the Hog Colerey -- I sent your honer the reciept to dirct to the Lgeslator did you recive my leter & Receipt have you Sent it to the hous of Delgats -- pleas in form mea the name of the Speaker of the house & what Post office to drect to him pleas ans this Direct in heart Finkes Burg Carroll Co ^^ ^Maryland^ I hope the Honerebel Lincoln will mke us a good presedent

I am truley yours
Samuel Wildesen
